introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is めずらしい, which you will often hear in situations when something unexpected or uncommon appears. People might use it when they find a new type of food, an unusual animal, or even during a special event that doesn't happen frequently.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "めずらしい" means something that is unusual or rare. It's used when you encounter something that you don't see very often or when something is different from the norm or expected. It can be used to describe unique experiences, rare objects, or special occurrences.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 異常 : いじょう : abnormal
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the "めずらしい" are ちんき and いじょう. ちんき generally denotes something novel or unusually interesting, much like curiosity. On the other hand, いじょう implies something abnormal, which may have a slightly negative connotation, unlike “めずらしい,” which is more neutral.
antonyms: 一般 : いっぱん : general
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the "めずらしい" are ふつう and いっぱん. ふつう refers to something regular, everyday, or standard, unlike "めずらしい," which is remarkable. いっぱん means generally or typically, often used when referring to commonly observed elements or occurrences, juxtaposed with rarity.

example_sentences.kanji: この店には珍しい食べ物があります。
example_sentences.furigana: この店(みせ)には珍(めずら)しい食(た)べ物(もの)があります。

translations.ID: Toko ini memiliki makanan yang langka.
translations.VI: Cửa hàng này có món ăn hiếm.
translations.FR: Ce magasin a des aliments rares.
translations.TL: May kakaibang pagkain ang tindahang ito.
translations.MY: ဒီဆိုင်မှာ ရှားပါးတဲ့ အစားအစာရှိတယ်။
translations.HI: इस दुकान में दुर्लभ भोजन है।
translations.AR: يوجد في هذا المحل طعام نادر.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は珍しい経験をしました。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は珍(めずら)しい経験(けいけん)をしました。

translations.VI: Tôi đã có một trải nghiệm hiếm có.
translations.ZH: 我有过一次难得的经历。
translations.MY: ငါ့မှာတစ်ခါမျှမရဘူးသောအတွေ့အကြုံတစ်ခုရှိပါတယ်.
translations.HI: मेरे पास एक दुर्लभ अनुभव था।

example_sentences.kanji: めずらしい景色を見ました。
example_sentences.furigana: めずらしい景色(けしき)を見(み)ました。

translations.VI: Tôi đã thấy một cảnh hiếm hoi.
translations.TL: Nakita ko ang isang bihirang tanawin.
translations.MY: ကောင်လေးတွေ မမြင်ဖူးတဲ့ ရှုခင်းကို မြင်ခဲ့တယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: これは珍しい名前です。
example_sentences.furigana: これは珍(めずら)しい名(な)前(まえ)です。

translations.ID: Ini adalah nama yang tidak biasa.
translations.VI: Đây là một cái tên hiếm có.
translations.TL: Ito ay isang hindi karaniwang pangalan.
translations.MY: ဒါဟာမှန်တယ်ဘာသာစကား.
translations.FA: این یک نام غیر معمول است.

example_sentences.kanji: それは珍しい文化です。
example_sentences.furigana: それは珍（めずら）しい文化（ぶんか）です。

translations.VI: Đó là một văn hóa hiếm.
translations.MY: ဒါဟာ လူ့ အဖွဲ့အစည်းအတွင်း ရှားပါးတဲ့ ယဉ်ကျေးမှုပါ။

rare.MY: အလွယ်တကူ မရပါ

new.ID: Langka, Tidak umum, Luar biasa, Baru
new.VI: Hiếm, Không phổ biến, Phi thường, Mới

fine.MY: နည်းပါးသော
